title: Slow roast shoulder of pork with roasties and apple sauce with hispi cabbage
description: When roast pork is combined with duck fat roasties and homemade apple sauce you really can't go wrong.
ingredients: 10 King Edward potatoes, peeled and cut into 2 or 3 pieces
4 Bramley apples, peeled and roughly chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
